column4: I am getting the following error when I try and run World of Goo:
Open Synaptic (System -> Administration -> Synaptic Package Manager). In Settings -> Repositories, make sure you have a "universe" repository activated.
Search for vlc and install it. You should also install vlc-plugin-pulse, mozilla-plugin
error while loading shared libraries: libSDL_mixer-1.2.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
any ideas on how to fix this? I have googled the error but the forum posts in the results to not applu
did not work. It produced the same error
what is the exact command you are running please?
I thought I tried that! haha
